_header: He that can throw Mercury of kind into the forsaid mold
_description: Rewards of the successful alchemist — two couplets

YaleBeiOsfa16.Transcription:
He that can throw {mercury} of kynd into the forsayd moldHe shall
                    haue siluer fyne and gold full red goldHe that can do this
                    treuly wythout any fableof þe quiterent he salnot mysse for to mak
                    aurum potable
YaleBeiOsfa16.Note:
Page numbered 38; written by a hand of the sixteenth century; ends,
                    ‘fynes’.
